alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 8:12PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...Conditions remains favorable for flash flooding, but the wind threat from tropical low (Invest 91p) has diminished... Although tropical low (Invest 91P) continues to weaken, the threat of flash flooding continues this evening with the SPCZ lingering near. Satellite data shows a line of convective clouds associated with the SPCZ just south of Tutuila and Manu`a. Hence, the Flash Flood Watch will continue through at least midnight. Winds on the other hand have fallen below advisory thresholds. As current observations and model data continue to hold a gentle to moderate breeze through the mid-levels, the wind advisory has been cancelled.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
